sub_topic: Finding the perimeter of a regular polygon.
message_1: A heptagon has a side length of 6 cm. What is the perimeter of this regular polygon?
message_2:
A heptagon has 7 sides. Since it is a regular polygon, all sides have the same length. To find the perimeter, we simply multiply the side length by the number of sides:

Perimeter = side length × number of sides
Perimeter = 6 cm × 7
Perimeter = 42 cm

The perimeter of the regular heptagon is 42 cm.
